name: Hermi Odle
Lore: 'Baragwin assigned by Jabba to be the palace''s master weaponsmith. Enemy of Pote Snitkin.',
Text: 'When in a battle, you may ''react'' by deploying any one non-unique blaster (for free) on Hermi from Reserve Deck. reshuffle. When present with your Advosze at a site, allows your character weapons to transfer for free there.',
